  1. News

  1. News

  1. Notice of Board of Elections Meeting Schedule

    NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN THAT the Rowan County Board of Elections will meet on the First Tuesday of the Month at 12:30 p.m., if necessary. Read on...

  2. Notice of Board Meeting May 7, 2019

    NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN that The Rowan County Board of Elections will meet at the Board of Elections Office on Tuesday, May 7, 2019 at 12:30 p.m. Read on...

  3. Substance Disorder Spring Training Sessions

    The Rowan County Health Department has partnered with Cardinal Innovations to provide Prevention, Treatment and Recovery focused training sessions at the Health Department (1811 E Innes Street, Salisbury, NC 28147). The trainings start March 14, 2019. Read on...

  4. Granite Industrial Park: Granite I Building Complete

    The Granite Quarry Industrial Park is Rowan County’s newest addition to a growing inventory of sites and buildings. Granite I, a spec building of 150,000 square feet has been completed. Read on...

  5. City Nature Challenge

    Cities around the world, including in Rowan County, will be competing to see who can make the most observations of nature, find the most species, and engage the most people in the 2019 City Nature Challenge. Read on...

  1. Chewy.com Will Create 1,200 New Jobs in Rowan County

    Chewy chooses Rowan County for new fulfillment center leading to the creation of 1,200 jobs and $55 million investment near Salisbury. Read on...

  2. Public Hearing: South Salisbury Fire Department

    Notice is hereby given by the South Salisbury Fire Department that a public hearing will be held on Sunday, May 19, 2019 at 6:00 p.m. at the South Salisbury Fire Department, 3207 Old Concord Road, Salisbury, North Carolina, 28146. Read on...

  3. Public Notice: Nomination Period for Rowan County Board of Social Services

    The Social Services Commission will make an appointment to the Rowan County Board of Social Services to fill the seat of an expired term. The term will expire June 30, 2019. The Social Services Commission will consider nominations at a future meeting. Read on...

  4. 2019 Schedule of Values

    The Schedule of Values is the set of standards and rules that the county uses uniformly to derive the assessed valuation of real property county-wide. Download a copy of the 2019 Schedule of Values. Read on...
